Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL EMPLOYEES

Title: Grants retroactive eligibility to apply for enhanced Tier 3 status to former New York City police officer Mark Rivera
Summary: Grants retroactive eligibility to apply for enhanced Tier 3 status to former New York City police officer Mark Rivera.
ActClause: AN ACT relating to granting retroactive eligibility to apply for enhanced Tier 3 status to former New York City police officer Mark Rivera
